languages.text: Вольному Торговцу не посчастливилось оказаться в секторе Комморры, именуемом Прорвой. Чтобы вырваться из Темного города, для начала Лорд-капитану предстоит найти путь из этого пропитанного смертью места.

The Rogue Trader was unlucky enough to end up in the part of Commorragh called the Chasm. To escape the Dark City, the Lord Captain first will need to break free from this place drenched in suffering and peril.
languages.original_text: Вольному Торговцу не посчастливилось оказаться в секторе Комморры, именуемом Прорвой. Чтобы вырваться из Темного города, для начала Лорд-капитану предстоит найти путь из этого пропитанного смертью места.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader was unlucky enough to end up in the part of Commorragh called the Chasm. To escape the Dark City, Lord Captain first will need to break free from this place drenched in suffering and peril.

The Rogue Trader was unlucky enough to end up in the part of Commorragh called the Chasm. To escape the Dark City, the Lord Captain first will need to break free from this place drenched in suffering and peril.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a eu le malheur de se retrouver dans la zone de Commorragh que l'on appelle l'Abîme. Pour s'échapper de la Cité Crépusculaire, {mf|il|elle} va d'abord devoir réussir à sortir de cet endroit empreint de douleur et de péril.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was unlucky enough to end up in the part of Commorragh called the Chasm. To escape the Dark City, the Lord Captain first will need to break free from this place drenched in suffering and peril.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a eu le malheur de se retrouver dans la zone de Commorragh que l'on appelle l'Abîme. Pour s'échapper de la Cité Crépusculaire, {mf|il|elle} va d'abord devoir réussir à sortir de cet endroit empreint de douleur et de péril.

languages.text: 行商浪人运气不佳，流落到了科摩罗的裂隙。若要逃离黑暗之城，行商浪人必须先从这个充满痛苦与危险的地方逃出去。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was unlucky enough to end up in the part of Commorragh called the Chasm. To escape the Dark City, the Lord Captain first will need to break free from this place drenched in suffering and peril.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人运气不佳，流落到了科摩罗的裂隙。若要逃离黑暗之城，行商浪人必须先从这个充满痛苦与危险的地方逃出去。

languages.text: 不運にも、自由開拓者はコモラフの裂け目と呼ばれる場所に行き着いた。仄暗き都から逃げ出すためにも、ロード・キャプテンはまず苦しみと危険に溢れたこの場所から脱出する必要がある。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was unlucky enough to end up in the part of Commorragh called the Chasm. To escape the Dark City, the Lord Captain first will need to break free from this place drenched in suffering and peril.

traits.locale_text: 不運にも、自由開拓者はコモラフの裂け目と呼ばれる場所に行き着いた。仄暗き都から逃げ出すためにも、ロード・キャプテンはまず苦しみと危険に溢れたこの場所から脱出する必要がある。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hatte das Pech, in dem Teil von Commorragh zu landen, der die Kluft genannt wird. Um aus der Dunklen Stadt zu entkommen, muss der Lord Captain zunächst aus dieser Hölle aus Leid und Gefahr entkommen.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was unlucky enough to end up in the part of Commorragh called the Chasm. To escape the Dark City, the Lord Captain first will need to break free from this place drenched in suffering and peril.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hatte das Pech, in dem Teil von Commorragh zu landen, der die Kluft genannt wird. Um aus der Dunklen Stadt zu entkommen, muss der Lord Captain zunächst aus dieser Hölle aus Leid und Gefahr entkommen.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha tenido la desgracia de acabar en la parte de Commorragh conocida como el Abismo. Para salir de la Ciudad Siniestra, primero tendrá que encontrar la forma de dejar este antro de sufrimiento y peligro.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was unlucky enough to end up in the part of Commorragh called the Chasm. To escape the Dark City, the Lord Captain first will need to break free from this place drenched in suffering and peril.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha tenido la desgracia de acabar en la parte de Commorragh conocida como el Abismo. Para salir de la Ciudad Siniestra, primero tendrá que encontrar la forma de dejar este antro de sufrimiento y peligro.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, talihsizliğine yenilip kendini Commorragh'ın Yarık denen bölgesinde buldu. Lord Kaptan'ın Kara Şehir'den kaçması için önce bu ızdırap ve tehlike dolu yerden kurtulması gerekecek.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was unlucky enough to end up in the part of Commorragh called the Chasm. To escape the Dark City, the Lord Captain first will need to break free from this place drenched in suffering and peril.
